document.full_text: derek jeter needs 14 hits to get to 3,000 during the yankees' 10-game homestand, but that requires more than his monthlong pace of 1.18 hits a game.
document.title: to reach 3,000 in bronx, jeter must pick up the pace
lines_and_colors: derek jeter needs 14 hits to get to 3,000 during the yankees' 10-game homestand, but that requires more than his monthlong pace of 1.18 hits a game.
